item.title: Narrative and Space: Reconstruction of South China Historical Trail Heritage Network
item.description: 叙事与空间 ——南粤古驿道遗产网络构建研究 LI Mengran, ZHENG Tong, TANG Chuqiao, LIU Longying, SU Yanni, LIANG Xiyue, LI Hui 李梦然 1 ，郑 潼 2 ，汤楚乔 3 ，刘龙英 4 ，苏燕妮 5 ，梁浠玥 6，李 晖 7 ABSTRACT Nanyue Ancient Path is the communication route between Lingnan and foreign regions, and has existed across periods throughout history. It is also known as the population migration corridor, the commodity exchange route and an ancient path making possible cultural exchange between civilizations.

item.title: 循·续——基于城市舒适物理论的白鹅潭片区概念性城市设计
item.description: 介绍：针对片区面临的文脉断裂及人性视角缺失的矛盾，引入“城市舒适物”（ Urban Amenity）理论，从片区中萃取舒适物元素，并从舒适物的五个层面架构片区舒适物网，串联起不同的舒适物及植入的新型舒适物，形成一个具有配套性和系统性的城市舒适运作体系。 ​ 将城市舒适物作为人的一系列不同活动和感知的整合结果,在城市设计过程中对舒适物进行应用,从人的需求方面去考虑城市更新,充分利用城市原有要素价值、延续人们对城市生活的感知记忆，在增强地方吸引力的同时保护当地居民的归属感和文化认同感。 2021年第一届智慧城市人居环境设计原创作品展 入围奖

item.title: 稽俗振今，众治兴村： 后乡土社会下乡村文化治理的实践与反思 ——基于连州市保安村的调查研究
item.description: Abstract China’s rural areas are in the transition period from “rural society” to “post-rural society”, and cultural governance is the countryside. The key to the breakthrough of village development. How to absorb the wisdom of rural cultural governance and find the endogenous driving force of rural cultural development, Exploring the experience of rural cultural governance is an important issue that needs to be solved at present. The report focuses on the governance of rural culture Comprehensive investigation, taking Baoan Village in Lianzhou City, Guangdong Province as an example, for a 3-year investigation and study.
